data.name: Roomie Romance
data.detailed_description:
Your start at a new job was always going to be hard, a new city, a new place to fit in.
But it is made far worse when you fall at first sight with your house mate and work mate, who simply asks you to call her Senpai.

The game follows the growing relationship between the Mira and Senpai over the course of a year, in true visual novel style gameplay your decisions will determine not only the events that occur throughout the game, but who you meet along the way, how you interact with them and what ending (from several) you will receive.

The main focus of this story is of a potential romance between Mira (the female protagonist) and the female housemate 'Cheryl'.
Making this a fun and often cute Yuri/Lesbian romance story.

Bonus Epilogue Stories

Your actions will also determine what bonus epilogue stories you can play and enjoy, which continue the story of these two young lovers after their first year together. See these characters as they have to clean their rooms, visit a public bath, exercise with friends, complete forfeits for losing bets, visit the local public festival and enjoy Christmas together.

See how their romance blossoms in these fun additional epilogue stories.

data.short_description: Will love blossom between you and your housemate Cheryl, when you start a new job and have to live with her? The choices you make will determine the relationship you have in this love story between two women.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 Gh
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
